page.title: 09RECREATION IN GRIMSARGH
page.content: In the middle of Grimsargh there is a recretation ground. It is a big open space covered with grass. It has some big trees and a wild pond. The grounds include a play area, a football pitch and cricket pitch. People interviewed said they bring their children to the swngs etc., walk their dogs, come to play sports, to have picnics. Villagers are satisfied with most of the things on the recreation ground but one or two people would like a cricket pavilion and some seats and possibly toilets.
